languages.text: "Песнь крови все громче звучит по отсекам, Домин. Восхваляя тебя. Привечая Висиря. Смерть блюдет — ибо смерть это Он. Ибо смерть — это я".

traits.locale_text: "Песнь крови все громче звучит по отсекам, Эним. Восхваляя тебя. Привечая Висиря. Смерть блюдет — ибо смерть это Он. Ибо смерть — это я".

languages.text: "The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising you. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch, for death is Him. For death is me."
languages.original_text: "Песнь крови все громче звучит по отсекам, Домин. Восхваляя тебя. Привечая Висиря. Смерть блюдет — ибо смерть это Он. Ибо смерть — это я".

traits.locale_text: "The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Enim. Praising You. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch: for death is Him. For death is me."
"The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Enim. Praising You. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch: for death is Him. For death is me."
"The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising You. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch: for death is Him. For death is me."
"The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising You. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch: for death is Him. For death is me."
"The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising you. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch, for death is Him. For death is me."
"The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising you. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch, for death is Him. For death is me."

languages.text: « La chanson du sang résonne avec toujours plus de force d'une baie à l'autre, Domin. Elle chante vos louanges. Elle salue la vizir. La mort poursuit sa veille, car Il est la mort incarnée. Car j'accomplis Sa volonté. »
languages.original_text: "The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising you. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch, for death is Him. For death is me."

traits.locale_text: « La chanson du sang résonne avec toujours plus de force d'une baie à l'autre, Domin. Elle chante vos louanges. Elle salue la vizir. La mort poursuit sa veille, car Il est la mort incarnée. Car j'accomplis Sa volonté. »

languages.text: «La canción de sangre se escucha con más fuerza en todas las bahías, Domin. Les alaban, a usted y al Visir. La Muerte está al acecho, pues Él es la muerte. Y también lo soy yo».
languages.original_text: "The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising you. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch, for death is Him. For death is me."

traits.locale_text: «La canción de sangre se escucha con más fuerza en todas las bahías, Domin. Les alaban, a usted y al Visir. La Muerte está al acecho, pues Él es la muerte. Y también lo soy yo».

languages.text: 「ドミン、血の歌がベイからベイへと響き渡っています。あなた様を称賛し、ヴィジールを讃えています。死は見守っています。死はあの方であり、死は私ですから」
languages.original_text: "The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising you. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch, for death is Him. For death is me."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン、血の歌がベイからベイへと響き渡っています。あなた様を称賛し、ヴィジールを讃えています。死は見守っています。死はあの方であり、死は私ですから」

languages.text: “在众多甲板之上，鲜血之歌的颂唱越发响亮，秘者。所有人都在赞美秘者，颂唱宿老。死亡在守望这一切，因为祂便是死亡本身，因为我便是死亡本身。”
languages.original_text: "The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising you. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch, for death is Him. For death is me."

traits.locale_text: “在众多甲板之上，鲜血之歌的颂唱越发响亮，秘者。所有人都在赞美秘者，颂唱宿老。死亡在守望这一切，因为祂便是死亡本身，因为我便是死亡本身。”

languages.text: "Das Lied des Blutes wird in Modul um Modul immer lauter und lauter vernommen, Domin. Es preist euch. Es preist den Wesir. Der Tod hält Wache, denn der Tod ist Er. Denn der Tod ist ich."
languages.original_text: "The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising you. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch, for death is Him. For death is me."

traits.locale_text: "Das Lied des Blutes wird in Modul um Modul immer lauter und lauter vernommen, Domin. Es preist euch. Es preist den Wesir. Der Tod hält Wache, denn der Tod ist Er. Denn der Tod ist ich."

languages.text: "Kanın şarkısı, her bölmede daha da yüksek seste söyleniyor Domin. Seni göklere çıkarıyor, Vezir'i selamlıyor. Ölüm nöbet bekliyor zira ölüm O'dur. Zira ölüm benim."
languages.original_text: "The song of blood is heard ever louder in bay after bay, Domin. Praising you. Saluting the Vizsier. Death keeps watch, for death is Him. For death is me."
